title: Some of the things I do

sections.description: I have worked extensively on building micro-services, or APIs, with JavaScript, Typescript, and Python for MicroAPI. Furthermore, I have worked with Golang to build micro-services for personal projects.
I develop through testing (TDD) with Jest and Cypress,
I practice Agile processes with remote teams using GitHub Projects, Issues, Slack, and Zoom,
I implement best practices and clean code,
I enjoy evening jogs and playing my favourite games,
I am an environmentalist who cares about water and sustainability,
I am a pianist (Itâ€™s important to note that I am no Lang Lang),
